tasks.task: Install a solar panel system on a roof.
subtasks: Gather necessary components including solar panels, microinverters, performance meter, AC disconnect, mounting rails, and conduit.
Lay out the solar panel layout on the roof, ensuring proper spacing and orientation.
Install mounting rails and fasteners for the solar panels.
Securely attach solar panels to the mounting rails, ensuring even distribution.
Connect microinverters to each solar panel and arrange them in strings for maximum performance.
Run electrical wires through appropriate conduits, using clips to manage cable placement.
Install AC disconnect and combiner box to manage power flow from the solar system.
Protect exposed wire connections with junction boxes and caps to avoid electrical hazards.
Mount the performance meter and ensure all electrical components are properly labeled and accessible.
Test the solar system and monitor its performance using the provided meter.
Adjust and optimize system performance based on real-world testing and daily usage.
